comments.comment:
Mama 1st time rata giye 2002 awrudde.ethakota apita agency walin eka rupiyalak wath dunne naha. Ape athin passport, Visa,medical ,insurance seerama salli deela hada ganna ona. Ehema  
Gihiƒ∫lath 1st month salary agencyata denna ona. Mama Lebanon walata giye padiya 9500rs.eath api giya. Mata labuna geya raththaran. Mata daruwekuta wage salakuwa.eath apita mobile thibune naha ee dawas wala. Lipi walin thamai lankawath ekka katha kale. Raa wena thuru wada karala adata yana ape duka tikak hari niwwe punchi cassette recorder eka.masa 2 ta 3 ta wathawa gedarin 5min call ekak aran denawa katha karanna lakawata. Nathan cassette records karala yawana.ee dawas wala kathare apita thibuna lokuma sathuta thami birida puwathpatha. Mama wieekayak labena hamamohothakma paththareta kavi ketikatha liwwa.mama awrudu 10k kathre seewaya kala,5k Lebanon, 4 Saudi Arabia, 1 Dubai. Devi pihiten labuna hama geyakma godak hoda karunika aya.mama mee Deval liwwe mata eka deyak theerune nathi nisa.ada godak aya laga mobile phone thiyenwa. Mata therena hatiyata godak aya phone eka use karnne lankawata katha karannata wada you tube eke randu weenna. Mee deewal api rata inna dawas wala kawadawath ahuwe, dakke naha. Siduwennath athi. Eeth apita dananna labune naha..mama katawath advice denne naha.rata yanne punchi babala nevi ne. Eath eka deyak kiyanna ona. Mee you tube eke, fb eke randu walin nathi wenne ape rate ayage saha ape rate garuthwaya. Rata hadanna kalin api hadila inna ona kayanawane. Uda bala kela gasuwoth thamangema muhunatai watenne.waradak thiyenawanam hari widiyata pahadili karala hada denna.kunu harupa kiyala kaagahala lajja karala nevi.jesu pihitai.
